card.description: Survey of customers in a bubble tea cafe on whether or not they like certain bubble tea combinations.

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of bubble tea a new customer should order.
context.potentialMisuses: Anything other than bubble tea recommendations.

fields.description: Does the bubble tea have mango jelly add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have regular boba add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have lychee add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have herbal add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have red beans add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have crystal boba add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have sea salt cream add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have vanilla add-ins?
Does the bubble tea have banana add-ins?
Did you like it or dislike it?
